mapper.update: update oc_busi_opp_collaborator set cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collaborate_date = #{collaborateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where busi_opp_no = #{busiOppNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and collaborator = #{collaborator,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.select: select busi_opp_no, collaborator, cust_no, collaborate_date, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_busi_opp_collaborator

select busi_opp_no, collaborator, cust_no, collaborate_date, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_busi_opp_collaborator where 1=1
and busi_opp_no = #{busiOppNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
